resources.string: Yi haƙuri! A yanzu Liƙaƙƙun Rubutu yana buƙata wani akwatin saƙo na Exchange Online don daidaita da kuma wurin adana su yi aiki. Don Allah tuntuɓi mai gudanarwar IT ɗinka game da ƙarfafawa wani akwatin saƙo ko yi amfani da zaɓen a ƙasa don ƙara koyo.
Ba mu samu daidaita Liƙaƙƙun Rubutu tare da asusunka ba. Don Allah tuntuɓi Goyon baya don taimako wajen warware wannan matsala.
Ba mu samu daidaita Liƙaƙƙun Rubutu tare da asusunka ba, amma ƙila ka iya yi ƙoƙari a warware wannan matsala.
